mapper.select: select id, customer_name, cname, from_unixtime(ctime / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') ctime, vname, case status when 0 then '拟定' when 1 then '待审核' when 2 then '已审核' end status, case finish when 0 then '未开始' when 1 then '进行中' when 2 then '已完成' end finish, from_unixtime(vtime / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') vtime, from_unixtime(ftime / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') ftime, total, remark from biz_sell_order ${ew.customSqlSegment}
